bibl.title: The Egyptian Gods in Attica: Some Epigraphical Evidence.
bibl.note: Athens, Epigraphical Museum No. 13342. Inscribed column: 1) Decree of the Athenian boule concerning the regulation of the cult of the Egyptian gods. Last half of the first cent. B.C. (?); - 2) Dedication to Isis of a fence or grille. Mid-first cent. after Christ (?).
bibl.seg: Pollitt J.J., The Egyptian Gods in Attica: Some Epigraphical Evidence.
